overview: Based on true events, the film reimagines the emotional meltdown of Philip Tress, a Jacksonville millennial described by local media as â€œunable to break from a psychotic, unrequited love affair". Phil's downfall gained notoriety as his breakdown was documented by multiple recordings of calls Phillip made to a customer service agent at an international shipping company.
tagline: Please rate your customer service experience.
title: Postal
